overview: Ned Catlin, a young Kentuckian, joins the army during World War I and is sent to France, leaving his sweetheart, June Reeves, behind him. A villainous neighbor who also covets June is drafted and returns with the false news that Ned is dead.
tagline: In this picture you will see the greatest feud of the Kentucky mountains started by two small children and oh boy how she grows.
title: The Fighting Kentuckians
